mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAMADOC_NUTRIENTS(nutrients_number, admin_number, nutrients_name, nutrients_effect, nutrients_info) VALUES(SEQ_MAMADOC_NUTRIENTS.NEXTVAL, #{adminNumber}, #{nutrientsName}, #{nutrientsEffect}, #{nutrientsInfo})
mapper.select: SELECT nutrients_number FROM ( SELECT nutrients_number FROM MAMADOC_NUTRIENTS ORDER BY nutrients_number DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
